title: Westcott 8" Titanium-Bonded Non-Stick Scissors For Office & Home, Gray/Yellow, 3 Pack (15454)
description: Westcott Titanium-Bonded Scissors are lighter, stronger, and sharper than other home or office shears. Durable titanium-bonded blades combined with non-stick coating to deliver improved cutting performance. These high-performance titanium-bonded nonstick blades boast six times the strength of the previous formula and are resistant to adhesives such as glue, adhesive tape and Velcro. Designed for left- or right-handed use, Westcott scissors feature straight handles with a contoured soft handle for enhanced comfort. Westcott, the leader in cutting technology, brings you a coordinated assortment of all the essential tools you need to bring your ideas to life.
